summary: This is a Navmesh Patch I made for "Ancient Refuge Snow Elf House" by Althinor
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange]Navmesh Patch for Ancient Refuge[/color]

[size=4][color=#4682B4][b]About this mod:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#C0C0C0]This mod is a complete redraw of the navmesh for the beautiful hose mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54121]Ancient Refuge Snow Elf House[/url] by Althinor. It took me 3 hours to complete and it was initially created only for myself but now I decided to share it with the community so others can enjoy the full potential of this amazing house mod.[/color]

[size=4][color=#4682B4][b]Problems found:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#C0C0C0]- Navmesh broken in various points inside the path leading to the house
- The navmesh betwen cells was not joined and it was not finallized
- Missing the appropriate box marker at entrance (inside)[/color]

[size=4][color=#4682B4][b]Fixes I made:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#C0C0C0]- Complete redraw of the navmesh from Tamriel world to inside the home
- The navmesh betwen cells is now properly joined checked for errors and finalized
- Added the appropriate box marker at entrance so that followers can travel with the player inside
- Corrected The navmesh inside the house main cell so that mannequins would not go around walking
- Altered house cell as a "no respawn area" so that mannequins would not unequipp provided gear as well ensuring containers would not respawn too[/color]

[size=4][color=#4682B4][b]Requirements:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#C0C0C0][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54121]Ancient Refuge Snow Elf House[/url] by Althinor[/color]

[size=4][color=#4682B4][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#C0C0C0]Instal trough Nexus Mod Manager or other multi-management mod organizer and overwrite original esp when prompted[/color]

----------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4][color=#4682B4][b]About Support:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#C0C0C0]I can only offer support to the navmesh work I did, everything else related to the house must be asked in the main mod page[/color]

[size=4][color=#4682B4][b]Recommended mods:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#C0C0C0][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18045]My Home Is Your Home - a mod for followers[/url] by Volek[/color]

[size=4][color=#4682B4][b]Credits and Thanks:[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#C0C0C0][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/12383363]Althinor[/url] for the beautiful house mod.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3552857]Myself[/url] for the navmesh work and respawn fix.
Bethesda for the amazing Game.
Nexus for the network community and support.[/color]
author: Xannon98
